name: A Cat Named Shmup
description:
Controls

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim

Space/Left Click - Fire/Absorb Spell

Scoring

  • Instead of scoring points by killing enemies, you gain points by absorbing your spell! 
  • Your spell becomes more powerful and worth more points the more enemies you kill. 
  • However, make sure to watch the spell power level on the bottom left or you might hurt yourself!

Description

Only One..... Bullet! Imagine your classic shmup, bullets everywhere. Well, in this re-imagining of the classic standard, you play as a cat witch practicing their magic in the forest. Bounce your spell off the force-field and gain more magic the more spirits you kill! But be careful, gather too much magic and it will start to hurt.
